name: No Bake Chocolate Almond Zesty snack bars, 2 ways. vegan glutenfree
description: These no bake chocolate bars are sure to satisfy a sweet tooth.  Zesty, vegan and gluten free!
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup chocolate (chips, chopped bar, dark. I use enjoy life semi sweet or whole foods vegan)
2-3 Tablespoons raw sugar or other sweetener (depends on sweetness of the chocolate)
2 Tablespoons Coconut milk or non dairy milk/creamer (I used SoDelicious plain coconut milk,)
1/2 cup + 1/4 cup coarsely crushed rice krispies
a generous pinch of spices of choice (I am currently on a ginger and clove binge)

recipeInstructions.text: Keep all the dry ingredients ready, mix 1/2 cup almonds and 1/2 cup rice krispies, spices, salt and zest and keep aside. Keep additional 1/4 cup crushed rice krispies in a bowl too
recipeInstructions.name: Keep all the dry ingredients ready, mix 1/2 cup almonds and 1/2 cup rice krispies, spices, salt and zest and keep aside. Keep additional 1/4 cup crushed rice krispies in a bowl too

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add the coconut milk, agave and sugar/sweetener and coconut oil.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add the coconut milk, agave and sugar/sweetener and coconut oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat on low and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat on low and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chocolate and mix continuously for a few seconds and switch off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chocolate and mix continuously for a few seconds and switch off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Keep stirring till all of it is melted into a nice flowy glaze.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep stirring till all of it is melted into a nice flowy glaze.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dry ingredients and mix well. Add more krispies if needed to make a stiff doughy mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dry ingredients and mix well. Add more krispies if needed to make a stiff doughy mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil hands and pat this mix down on parchment into thickness desired. I made a 1/2 inch thick, 8 by 8 inch somewhat square.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil hands and pat this mix down on parchment into thickness desired. I made a 1/2 inch thick, 8 by 8 inch somewhat square.

recipeInstructions.text: Refrigerate for an hour, cut, eat!
recipeInstructions.name: Refrigerate for an hour, cut, eat!

itemListElement.text: Crumble up the cake into fine crumbs (Used a little more than 1 cup crumbs) instead of the dry ingredients. If the cake is already sweet enough, skip the sugar in the melted chocolate mix. Add dry to wet, spread, cool, cut, eat.
